price: Such is the All-Knower of the unseen and the seen, the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
